inclusion.criterion: Adult patients with a history of a nonsecreting pituitary tumor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with or without prior pituitary surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current use of GH therapy or within the prior 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: takes only vitamin D and multivitamins

notes: Patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago.
